opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of November, 2013, the order of the Superior Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Justice STEVENS did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
